entry.name: async
entry.title: async()

argument.name: acceptCallCount
argument.desc: Number accept a call count of callback of assert.async().

entry.desc: Instruct QUnit to wait for an asynchronous operation.

longdesc.p: When your test has any asynchronous exit points, call assert.async() to get a unique resolution callback for each async operation. The callback returned from assert.async() will throw an Error if is invoked more than accept call count.
This replaces functionality previously provided by QUnit.stop() and QUnit.start().

example.desc: Tell QUnit to wait for the done() call inside the timeout.
Call assert.async() for each operation. Each done callback can be called at most once.
Establish an accept call count. The done() callback can be called at accpet call count.
